fields.text: One of the true weapons wielded by the legendary Zodiac Braves. All the quest can be done unsync except the book's fates part.

fields.description:
To obtain a Zenith Zodiac weapon, one must simply access the furnace near Gerolt and provide the necessary quantity of Thavnairian Mist. Although A Relic Reborn quest must be completed for each Zodiac Weapon, reaching the Zenith stage is a separate process. Raising the weapon to a Zenith Zodiac weapon only requires accessing the furnace near Gerolt with the required amount of Thavnairian Mist.

Steps:

  1. Obtain the Timeworn Gae Bolg from a treasure coffer in Natalan.
  2. Deliver the Timeworn Gae Bolg to Gerolt.
  3. Deliver a materia-enhanced Champion's Lance to Gerolt.
  4. Examine the destination at the Weeping Saint and, as a dragoon, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Chimera."
  5. Deliver the Alumina Salts to Gerolt.
  6. Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
  7. Obtain an Amdapor Glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a dragoon.
  8. Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
  9. Buy 1 Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil and 3 Thavnairian Mist from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6), you will need them later in the next steps of the Zodiac Saga.
  10. Deliver the copy of The Book of Reinette to Gerolt.
  11. Slay Natalan Boldwings while equipped with the unfinished Gae Bolg.
  12. Slay Natalan Fogcallers while equipped with the unfinished Gae Bolg.
  13. Slay Natalan Swiftbeaks while equipped with the unfinished Gae Bolg.
  14. Speak with Gerolt.
  15. Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the unfinished Gae Bolg equipped, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Hydra."
  16. Speak with Gerolt.
  17. Give the Unfinished Gae Bolg to Gerolt.
  18. Obtain a White-Hot Ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a dragoon.
  19. Obtain a Howling Gale in The Howling Eye (Hard) as a dragoon.
  20. Obtain a chunk of Hyperfused Ore in The Navel (Hard) as a dragoon.
  21. Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.
  22. Deliver a bottle of Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil to Gerolt.

If you are doing this part for the first time you'll have the quest  but the quest only needs to be completed once, for your first Atma Zodiac weapon; for each additional weapon you'll still need to acquire all Atmas, equip the Relic Weapon and talk to Jalzahn.

  • Speak with Jalzahn.

 

Atmas have a random drop chance one so you'll have to farm and not get despaired of it.

Location

Atma

North Shroud

Atma of the Archer

Eastern Thanalan

Atma of the Bull

Western La Noscea

Atma of the Crab

Lower La Noscea

Atma of the Fish

East Shroud

Atma of the Goat

Outer La Noscea

Atma of the Lion

Central Shroud

Atma of the Maiden

Middle La Noscea

Atma of the Ram

Central Thanalan

Atma of the Scales

Southern Thanalan

Atma of the Scorpion

Western Thanalan

Atma of the Twins

Upper La Noscea

Atma of the Water-bearer

 

Once you have the crystals, speak to Jalzahn and enhance your weapon to the next step.

If it is not your first time doing the Atma Zodiac weapon, Jalzahn will have a blue quest Kettle to the Mettle and untill you take this quest you will not be able to get an Atma weapon. You dont have to do the quest but you'll have to take it in order to continue the relic weapon progression.

1. Use the Furnace near Gerolt to forge Zenith weapon using the Thavnarian Mist you bought before.

Nice and easy

Having you'r relic weapon equipped is mandatory to progress.

    If you are doing your first Zodiac weapon - speak to Jalzahn - North Shroud (X:29.5, Y:19.6), and pick up the quest Trials of the Braves. He will send you to Mor Dhona.There, you will find G'jusana (X:22.9, Y:7.3) who sells Books for 100 Tomestones of Poetics each. You need nine Books (900 poetics) in total, and each Book has 19 tasks to finish. The tasks are different for each Book, but they are the same kind of activities for all Books. Make sure you have your Relic Weapon on when you do the tasks.

Each Book will ask you to do the following.

  • Complete three Dungeons
  • Defeat 10 different enemies, three times each in diffrent locations.
  • Complete three FATEs
  • Complete three Levequests

    G'jusana will only accept one Book at a time from you. You have to finish and return it before you can get a new one. Be careful not to buy a new Book before you complete the current one, or you will lose your progress.

Tips:

  • Some FATEs have special conditions to appear, such as waiting for a certain time or doing something to trigger them. If you don't see the FATE you want for a long time, check if it has any requirements before you assume it's just bad luck.
  • If you don't see the quest you want from the Levemette, you can try to get a different quest by completing some levequests in the same group. You might have to repeat this process a few times until you find the right one. Also make sure you didn't mistaken the levemette for grand company levemette or vice versa.

After all books are done:

  • Buy 3 Superior Enchanted Ink from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6)
  • Go to Jalzahn - North Shroud (X:29.5, Y:19.6), peak with him an pick "Relic Weapon Atma Enhancement".

Get the Celestial Radiance quest from Jalzahn in North Shroud (X:29.5, Y:19.6).

Celestial Radiance is a quest that you only complete once, so you can skip it if you already have another Zodiac weapon. Just follow the instructions from the NPCs. You will also need to buy 3 Superior Enchanted Ink from Auriana in Mor Dhona (X:22.7, Y:6.7) or you might have them already if you followed this guide step by step :)

After giving the Ink to Hubairtin in Central Thanalan (23, 13), you will get a Sphere Scroll, which is needed for the next step.

To enhance the Sphere Scroll, with materia, you will need to go through four stages of infusion. Each stage requires a different level of materia and an item called Alexandrite to fuse the materia to your weapon.

Alexandrite is a special material that you can gain in the following ways. You will need a total of 75 to complete this step.

  • Treasure from Mysterious Maps (5 Alexandrite per map), which can be obtained from:
    • 'Morbid Motivation' daily quest — complete Duty Roulette: Level 50/60/70/80 Dungeon
        • This quest can be received from Brangwine in Mor Dhona (X:21.9, Y:6.7)
    • Purchase for 75 Tomestones of Poetics from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6)

Another method is to obtain Alexandrite by:

  • Complete Level 50 or below FATEs with your Relic Weapon equipped (1 Alexandrite per FATE)
  • Purchase 1 Alexandrite for 50 Allied Seals from Hunt Billmaster in your Grand Company's Headquarters

The most efficient way is to get Mysterious Maps.

You can only slot maximum of 11 materia of one grade and type per tier. For instance, you can use 11 Quickarm Materia I for the first stage, but you will need Quickarm Materia II for the second stage, and so on.

You can choose any two stats to boost with materia, but you can only slot 44 materia of one stat and 31 materia of another stat in total. You don't have to stick to the same stat for all stages, and you can buy any cheap materia from the Market Board.

However, be aware that there is a risk of failing to infuse the materia to your weapon. The probability of success is shown below.

Materia

Success Rate

First-Sixth

100%

Seventh

96%

Eighth

90%

Ninth

82%

Tenth

72%

Eleventh

60%

Relaxing tip:
If the materia melding fails, you won't lose your Alexandrite

After you are done this the scroll and it is fully melded, go to Jalzahn again and exhange your weapon and the scroll for a Novus Weapon.

To obtain a Zenith Zodiac weapon, one must simply access the furnace near Gerolt and provide the necessary quantity of Thavnairian Mist. Although A Relic Reborn quest must be completed for each Zodiac Weapon, reaching the Zenith stage is a separate process. Raising the weapon to a Zenith Zodiac weapon only requires accessing the furnace near Gerolt with the required amount of Thavnairian Mist.

Steps:

  1. Obtain the Timeworn Curtana from a treasure coffer in Zahar'ak.
  2. Deliver the Timeworn Curtana to Gerolt.
  3. Deliver a materia-enhanced Aeolian Scimitar to Gerolt.
  4. Examine the destination at the Weeping Saint and, as a paladin, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Chimera."
  5. Deliver the Alumina Salts to Gerolt.
  6. Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
  7. Obtain an Amdapor Glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a paladin.
  8. Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
  9. Buy 1 Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil and 3 Thavnairian Mist from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6), you will need them later in the next steps of the Zodiac Saga.
  10. Deliver the copy of The Song of Tristram to Gerolt.
  11. Slay Zahar'ak Lancers while equipped with the unfinished Curtana.
  12. Slay Zahar'ak Pugilists while equipped with the unfinished Curtana.
  13. Slay Zahar'ak Thaumaturges while equipped with the unfinished Curtana.
  14. Speak with Gerolt.
  15. Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the unfinished Curtana equipped, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Hydra."
  16. Speak with Gerolt.
  17. Give the unfinished Curtana to Gerolt.
  18. Obtain a White-Hot Ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a paladin.
  19. Obtain a Howling Gale in The Howling Eye (Hard) as a paladin.
  20. Obtain a chunk of Hyperfused Ore in The Navel (Hard) as a paladin.
  21. Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.
  22. Deliver a bottle of Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil to Gerolt.

To obtain a Zenith Zodiac weapon, one must simply access the furnace near Gerolt and provide the necessary quantity of Thavnairian Mist. Although A Relic Reborn quest must be completed for each Zodiac Weapon, reaching the Zenith stage is a separate process. Raising the weapon to a Zenith Zodiac weapon only requires accessing the furnace near Gerolt with the required amount of Thavnairian Mist.

Steps:

  1. Obtain the pair of Timeworn Sphairai from a treasure coffer in Zahar'ak.
  2. Deliver the pair of Timeworn Sphairai to Gerolt.
  3. Deliver a pair of materia-enhanced Wildling's Cesti to Gerolt.
  4. Examine the destination at the Weeping Saint and, as a monk, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Chimera."
  5. Deliver the Alumina Salts to Gerolt.
  6. Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
  7. Obtain an Amdapor Glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a monk.
  8. Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
  9. Buy 1 Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil and 3 Thavnairian Mist from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6), you will need them later in the next steps of the Zodiac Saga.
  10. Deliver the copy of Enter the Coeurl to Gerolt.
  11. Slay Zahar'ak Lancers while equipped with the pair of unfinished Sphairai equipped.
  12. Slay Zahar'ak Pugilists while equipped with the pair of unfinished Sphairai equipped.
  13. Slay Zahar'ak Archers while equipped with the pair of unfinished Sphairai equipped.
  14. Speak with Gerolt.
  15. Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the pair of unfinished Sphairai equipped, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Hydra."
  16. Speak with Gerolt.
  17. Give the pair of unfinished Sphairai to Gerolt.
  18. Obtain a White-Hot Ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a monk.
  19. Obtain a Howling Gale in The Howling Eye (Hard) as a monk.
  20. Obtain a chunk of Hyperfused Ore in The Navel (Hard) as a monk.
  21. Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.
  22. Deliver a bottle of Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil to Gerolt.

To obtain a Zenith Zodiac weapon, one must simply access the furnace near Gerolt and provide the necessary quantity of Thavnairian Mist. Although A Relic Reborn quest must be completed for each Zodiac Weapon, reaching the Zenith stage is a separate process. Raising the weapon to a Zenith Zodiac weapon only requires accessing the furnace near Gerolt with the required amount of Thavnairian Mist.

Steps:

  1. Obtain the pair of Timeworn Yoshimitsu from the banded chest in the Sapsa Spawning Grounds.
  2. Deliver the pair of Timeworn Yoshimitsu to Gerolt.
  3. Deliver a pair of materia-enhanced Vamper's Knives to Gerolt.
  4. As a ninja, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Chimera."
  5. Deliver the Alumina Salts to Gerolt.
  6. Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
  7. Obtain an Amdapor Glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a ninja.
  8. Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
  9. Buy 1 Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil and 3 Thavnairian Mist from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6), you will need them later in the next steps of the Zodiac Saga.
  10. Deliver the copy of Shonin-ki to Gerolt.
  11. Slay Sapsa Shelfspine while equipped with the pair of unfinished Yoshimitsu. 0/8
  12. Slay Sapsa Shelfclaw while equipped with the pair of unfinished Yoshimitsu. 0/8
  13. Slay Sapsa Shelftooth while equipped with the pair of unfinished Yoshimitsu. 0/8
  14. Speak with Gerolt.
  15. Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the pair of unfinished Yoshimitsu equipped, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Hydra."
  16. Speak with Gerolt.
  17. Give the pair of Unfinished Yoshimitsu to Gerolt.
  18. Obtain a White-Hot Ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a ninja.
  19. Obtain a Howling Gale in The Howling Eye (Hard) as a ninja.
  20. Obtain a chunk of Hyperfused Ore in The Navel (Hard) as a ninja.
  21. Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.
  22. Deliver a bottle of Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil to Gerolt.

To obtain a Zenith Zodiac weapon, one must simply access the furnace near Gerolt and provide the necessary quantity of Thavnairian Mist. Although A Relic Reborn quest must be completed for each Zodiac Weapon, reaching the Zenith stage is a separate process. Raising the weapon to a Zenith Zodiac weapon only requires accessing the furnace near Gerolt with the required amount of Thavnairian Mist.

Steps:

  1. Obtain the Timeworn Artemis Bow from a treasure coffer in Natalan.
  2. Deliver the Timeworn Artemis Bow to Gerolt.
  3. Deliver a materia-enhanced Longarm's Composite Bow to Gerolt.
  4. Examine the destination at the Weeping Saint and, as a bard, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Chimera."
  5. Deliver the Alumina Salts to Gerolt.
  6. Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
  7. Obtain an Amdapor Glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a bard.
  8. Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
  9. Buy 1 Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil and 3 Thavnairian Mist from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6), you will need them later in the next steps of the Zodiac Saga.
  10. Deliver the copy of Bow of the Gods to Gerolt.
  11. Slay Natalan Boldwings while equipped with the unfinished Artemis Bow.
  12. Slay Natalan Fogcallers while equipped with the unfinished Artemis Bow.
  13. Slay Natalan Windtalons while equipped with the unfinished Artemis Bow.
  14. Speak with Gerolt.
  15. Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the unfinished Artemis Bow equipped, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Hydra."
  16. Speak with Gerolt.
  17. Give the Unfinished Artemis Bow to Gerolt.
  18. Obtain a White-Hot Ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a bard.
  19. Obtain a Howling Gale in The Howling Eye (Hard) as a bard.
  20. Obtain a chunk of Hyperfused Ore in The Navel (Hard) as a bard.
  21. Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.
  22. Deliver a bottle of Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil to Gerolt.

To obtain a Zenith Zodiac weapon, one must simply access the furnace near Gerolt and provide the necessary quantity of Thavnairian Mist. Although A Relic Reborn quest must be completed for each Zodiac Weapon, reaching the Zenith stage is a separate process. Raising the weapon to a Zenith Zodiac weapon only requires accessing the furnace near Gerolt with the required amount of Thavnairian Mist.

Steps:

  1. Obtain the Timeworn Stardust Rod from a treasure coffer in U'Ghamaro Mines.
  2. Deliver the Timeworn Stardust Rod to Gerolt.
  3. Deliver a materia-enhanced Sanguine Scepter to Gerolt.
  4. Examine the destination at the Weeping Saint and, as a black mage, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Chimera."
  5. Deliver the Alumina Salts to Gerolt.
  6. Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
  7. Obtain an Amdapor Glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a black mage.
  8. Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
  9. Buy 1 Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil and 3 Thavnairian Mist from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6), you will need them later in the next steps of the Zodiac Saga.
  10. Deliver the copy of On Verdant Pond to Gerolt.
  11. Slay U'Ghamaro Quarryman while equipped with the unfinished Stardust Rod.
  12. Slay U'Ghamaro Priests while equipped with the unfinished Stardust Rod.
  13. Slay U'Ghamaro Bedesman while equipped with the unfinished Stardust Rod.
  14. Speak with Gerolt.
  15. Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the unfinished Stardust Rod equipped, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Hydra."
  16. Speak with Gerolt.
  17. Give the unfinished Stardust Rod to Gerolt.
  18. Obtain a White-Hot Ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a black mage.
  19. Obtain a Howling Gale in The Howling Eye (Hard) as a black mage.
  20. Obtain a chunk of Hyperfused Ore in The Navel (Hard) as a black mage.
  21. Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.

fields.quest_name: A Relic Reborn (The Veil of Wiyu)
fields.description:
To obtain a Zenith Zodiac weapon, one must simply access the furnace near Gerolt and provide the necessary quantity of Thavnairian Mist. Although A Relic Reborn quest must be completed for each Zodiac Weapon, reaching the Zenith stage is a separate process. Raising the weapon to a Zenith Zodiac weapon only requires accessing the furnace near Gerolt with the required amount of Thavnairian Mist.

Steps:

  1. Obtain the Timeworn Veil of Wiyu from a treasure coffer in the Sylphlands.
  2. Deliver the Timeworn Veil of Wiyu to Gerolt.
  3. Deliver a materia-enhanced Erudite's Picatrix of Casting of casting to Gerolt.
  4. Examine the destination at the Weeping Saint and, as a summoner, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Chimera."
  5. Deliver the Alumina Salts to Gerolt.
  6. Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
  7. Obtain an Amdapor Glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a summoner.
  8. Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
  9. Buy 1 Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil and 3 Thavnairian Mist from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6), you will need them later in the next steps of the Zodiac Saga.
  10. Deliver the copy of Under the Veil to Gerolt.
  11. Slay Sylpheed Snarls while equipped with the unfinished Veil of Wiyu.
  12. Slay Sylpheed Sighs while equipped with the unfinished Veil of Wiyu.
  13. Slay Sylpheed Screeches while equipped with the unfinished Veil of Wiyu.
  14. Speak with Gerolt.
  15. Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the unfinished Veil of Wiyu equipped, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Hydra."
  16. Speak with Gerolt.
  17. Give the Unfinished Veil of Wiyu to Gerolt.
  18. Obtain a White-Hot Ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a summoner.
  19. Obtain a Howling Gale in The Howling Eye (Hard) as a summoner.
  20. Obtain a chunk of Hyperfused Ore in The Navel (Hard) as a summoner.
  21. Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.
  22. Deliver a bottle of Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil to Gerolt.

To obtain a Zenith Zodiac weapon, one must simply access the furnace near Gerolt and provide the necessary quantity of Thavnairian Mist. Although A Relic Reborn quest must be completed for each Zodiac Weapon, reaching the Zenith stage is a separate process. Raising the weapon to a Zenith Zodiac weapon only requires accessing the furnace near Gerolt with the required amount of Thavnairian Mist.

Steps:

  1. Obtain the Timeworn Thyrus from a treasure coffer in U'Ghamaro Mines.
  2. Deliver the Timeworn Thyrus to Gerolt.
  3. Deliver a materia-enhanced Madman's Whispering Rod to Gerolt.
  4. Examine the destination at the Weeping Saint and, as a white mage, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Chimera."
  5. Deliver the Alumina Salts to Gerolt.
  6. Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
  7. Obtain an Amdapor Glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a white mage.
  8. Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
  9. Buy 1 Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil and 3 Thavnairian Mist from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6), you will need them later in the next steps of the Zodiac Saga.
  10. Deliver the copy of Interview with the Padjal to Gerolt.
  11. Slay U'Ghamaro Quarryman while equipped with the unfinished Thyrus.
  12. Slay U'Ghamaro Priests while equipped with the unfinished Thyrus.
  13. Slay U'Ghamaro Bedesman while equipped with the unfinished Thyrus.
  14. Speak with Gerolt.
  15. Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the unfinished Thyrus, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Hydra."
  16. Speak with Gerolt.
  17. Give the Unfinished Thyrus to Gerolt.
  18. Obtain a White-Hot Ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a white mage.
  19. Obtain a Howling Gale in The Howling Eye (Hard) as a white mage.
  20. Obtain a chunk of Hyperfused Ore in The Navel (Hard) as a white mage.
  21. Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.
  22. Deliver a bottle of Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil to Gerolt.

To obtain a Zenith Zodiac weapon, one must simply access the furnace near Gerolt and provide the necessary quantity of Thavnairian Mist. Although A Relic Reborn quest must be completed for each Zodiac Weapon, reaching the Zenith stage is a separate process. Raising the weapon to a Zenith Zodiac weapon only requires accessing the furnace near Gerolt with the required amount of Thavnairian Mist.

Steps:

  1. Obtain a timeworn copy of the Omnilex from a treasure coffer in the Sapsa Spawning Grounds.
  2. Deliver the timeworn copy of the Omnilex to Gerolt.
  3. Deliver a materia-enhanced Erudite's Picatrix of Healing to Gerolt.
  4. Examine the destination at the Weeping Saint and, as a scholar, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Chimera."
  5. Deliver the Alumina Salts to Gerolt.
  6. Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
  7. Obtain an Amdapor Glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a scholar.
  8. Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
  9. Buy 1 Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil and 3 Thavnairian Mist from Auriana in Mor Dhona (22.7, 6.6), you will need them later in the next steps of the Zodiac Saga.
  10. Deliver the copy of War of the Magi to Gerolt.
  11. Slay Sapsa Shelfspine while equipped with the unfinished copy of the Omnilex.
  12. Slay Sapsa Shelfclaw while equipped with the unfinished copy of the Omnilex.
  13. Slay Sapsa Shelftooth while equipped with the unfinished copy of the Omnilex.
  14. Speak with Gerolt.
  15. Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the unfinished copy of the Omnilex equipped, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial "A Relic Reborn: The Hydra."
  16. Speak with Gerolt.
  17. Give the unfinished copy of the Omnilex to Gerolt.
  18. Obtain a White-Hot Ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a scholar.
  19. Obtain a Howling Gale in The Howling Eye (Hard) as a scholar.
  20. Obtain a chunk of Hyperfused Ore in The Navel (Hard) as a scholar.
  21. Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.
  22. Deliver a bottle of Radz-at-Han Quenching Oil to Gerolt.

Take the one-time quest Mmmmmm, Soulglazed Relics from Jalzahn when ask him to soulgaze you'r weapon (if you are a paladin, dont forget to soulgaze the shield too).

Now you can get the energy, so called "Light" as you complete duties.

To upgrade your Novus to Nexus weapon, you need to collect 2000 Light points by completing duties. The amount of light points you get depends on the level of the duty. Higher-level duties like Crystal Tower raids give more light than lower-level ones like Sastasha. You can check the progress of your weapon by using the Zodiac Glass.

A good strategy for this step is to look for duties that have a bonus light reward. You can do this by running every ARR trial and seeing which one gives you the most light. If none of them have a bonus, you can run dungeons like Aurum Vale instead.

You can also use the Zodiac buddy plugin to find out which duties have a bonus light.

fields.quest_name: Wherefore Art Thou, Zodiac (Zodiac Braves Weapon)
fields.description:
Speak to the Jalzahn and take the quest Wherefore Art Thou, Zodiac. For the second weapon there will be no quest, you can just go to Mor Dhona to take a 4 repeatable quests:

  • A Ponze of Flesh
  • A Treasured Mother
  • Labor of Love
  • Method in His Malice

- - - - - - - - -

A Ponze of Flesh

NPC Location:

  • Papana - Mor Dhona (X:22.9, Y:7.3)

Acquire a Book of Skylight by gathering the following.

Item

How to Acquire

Bombard Core

Buy for 20,000 Company Seals (you will need 4 of these items, you can buy 4 at once for the future)

Sacred Spring Water

Buy for 200 Poetics from Auriana in Mor Dhona (X:22.7, Y:6.7) (you will need 4 of these items, you can buy 4 at once for the future)

Bronze Lake Crystal

Buy for 100,000 gil from Junkmonger in Upper La Noscea (X:26, Y:26)

Horn of the Beast

Dzemael Darkhold

Gobmachine Bangplate

Brayflox's Longstop (Hard)

Narasimha Hide

Halatali (Hard)

Sickle Fang

Snowcloak

Furnace Ring (HQ)

Choose one:

  • Craft as Goldsmith
  • Desynthesize aged ring from Silver Bazaar (Hammerlea, Western Thanalan)
  • Buy from Market Board

Perfect Firewood (HQ)

Choose one:

  • Craft as Carpenter
  • Desynthesize aged spear from Silver Bazaar (Hammerlea, Western Thanalan)
  • Buy from Market Board

- - - - - - - - -

Labor of Love

NPC Location:

  • Guiding Star - Mor Dhona (X:21.9, Y:6.9)

Acquire Zodium by gathering the following.

Item

How to Acquire

Bombard Core

Buy for 20,000 Company Seals (If you have already bought 4 of them doing the quest A Ponze of Flesh then you don't need to buy them)

Sacred Spring Water

Buy for 200 Poetics from Auriana in Mor Dhona (X:22.7, Y:6.7) (If you have already bought 4 of them doing the quest A Ponze of Flesh then you don't need to buy them)

Allagan Resin

Buy for 100,000 Gil from Merchant & Mender in Southern Thanalan (X:15, Y:29)

Vale Bubo

Aurum Vale

Voidweave

Huakke Manor (Hard)

Amdapor Vellum

The Lost City of Amdapor

Indigo Pearl

Sastasha (Hard)

Perfect Mortar (HQ)

Choose one:

  • Craft as Armorer
  • Desynthesize aged mortar from Silver Bazaar (Hammerlea, Western Thanalan)
  • Buy from Market Board

Perfect Pestle (HQ)

Choose one:

  • Craft as Blacksmith
  • Desynthesize aged pestle from Silver Bazaar (Hammerlea, Western Thanalan)
  • Buy from Market Board

- - - - - - - - -

A Treasured Mother

NPC Location:

  • Brangwine - Mor Dhona (X:21.9, Y:6.7)

Acquire Flawless Alexandrite by gathering the following.

Item

How to Acquire

Bombard Core

Buy for 20,000 Company Seals (If you have already bought 4 of them doing the quest A Ponze of Flesh then you don't need to buy them)

Sacred Spring Water

Buy for 200 Poetics from Auriana in Mor Dhona (X:22.7, Y:6.7) (If you have already bought 4 of them doing the quest A Ponze of Flesh then you don't need to buy them)

Brass Kettle

Buy for 100,000 Gil from Tool Supplier and Mender in North Shroud (X:29.9, Y:19.0)

Lost Treasure of Amdapor Keep

Amdapor Keep

Lost Treasure of Pharos Sirius

Pharos Sirius

Lost Treasure of Tam-Tara Deepcroft

Tam-Tara Deepcroft (Hard)

Lost Treasure of Stone Vigil

Stone Vigil (Hard)

Tailor-made Eel Pie (HQ)

Choose one:

  • Craft as Culinarian
  • Desynthesize aged decanter from Silver Bazaar (Hammerlea, Western Thanalan)
  • Buy from Market Board

Perfect Cloth (HQ)

Choose one:

  • Craft as Weaver
  • Desynthesize aged robe from Silver Bazaar (Hammerlea, Western Thanalan)
  • Buy from Market Board

- - - - - - - - -

Method in His Malice

NPC Location:

  • Adkin - Central Thanalan (X:23.6, Y:13.7)

Acquire a Zodiac Scroll by gathering the following.

Item

How to Acquire

Bombard Core

Buy for 20,000 Company Seals (If you have already bought 4 of them doing the quest A Ponze of Flesh then you don't need to buy them)

Sacred Spring Water

Buy for 200 Poetics from Auriana in Mor Dhona (X:22.7, Y:6.7) (If you have already bought 4 of them doing the quest A Ponze of Flesh then you don't need to buy them)

Furite Sand

Buy for 100,000 Gil from Merchant & Mender in Coerthas Central Highlands (X:13.2, Y:15.9)

Tonberry King Blood

The Wanderer's Palace

Royal Gigant Blood

Copperbell Mines (Hard)

Kraken Blood

Hullbreaker Isle

Vicegerent Blood

The Sunken Temple of Qarn (Hard)

Perfect Vellum (HQ)

Choose one:

  • Craft as Leatherworker
  • Desynthesize aged grimoire from Silver Bazaar (Hammerlea, Western Thanalan)
  • Buy from Market Board

Perfect Pounce (HQ)

Choose one:

  • Craft as Alchemist
  • Desynthesize aged phial from Silver Bazaar (Hammerlea, Western Thanalan)
  • Buy from Market Board

- - - - - - - - -

His Dark Materia

NPC Location:

  • Gerolt - North Shroud (X:30.2, Y:20.2)

After you have gathered a Book of Skylight, Zodum, Flawless Alexandrite, and a Zodiac Scroll, return to Jalzahn to finally upgrade your Nexus weapon to Zodiac status.

• Jalzahn - Hyrstmill, North Shroud (X:29.5, Y:19.6)

This is the final quest in the Zodiac Weapon questline and will reward you with a Zodiac Zeta weapon upon completion.

This step is similar to the step in which you gathered light points from before. However, this time you will need to infuse 12 different Mahatma with light. Each Mahatma will need 40 total light points, and they are named as follows.

  1. Mahatma of the Ram
  2. Mahatma of the Bull
  3. Mahatma of the Twins
  4. Mahatma of the Crab
  5. Mahatma of the Lion
  6. Mahatma of the Maiden
  7. Mahatma of the Scales
  8. Mahatma of the Scorpion
  9. Mahatma of the Archer
  10. Mahatma of the Goat
  11. Mahatma of the Water-bearer
  12. Mahatma of the Fish

You will need to purchase each Mahatma from Remon in North Shroud (X:34.3, Y:31.7) for 50 Poetics, or 600 Poetics in total for all 12 Mahatma. They must be completed in the order listed above.

Light points can be gained in the same way as before. The best way of quickly completing this quest is to run Tam-Tara Deepcroft twice for each Mahatma. One clear of this dungeon will grant 24 light points, which means you will only need to do two clears to finish a Mahatma. As long as you run Tam-Tara unsynced in an undersized party, you should have no problems clearing it quickly.

If doing Tam-Tara Deepcroft 24 times in a row doesn't sound fun, you can also do any of the duties listed in the previous light step, including FATEs, Trials, and Raids.

Unsynced parties will always be the best way to gather light, no matter the Duty you are completing.

After you have finished infusing all 12 Mahatma, speak with Jalzahn and select Zodiac Weapon Awakening. Watch the short cutscene, and your Zodiac weapon will be complete!
Bravura is an item level 80 Marauder's Arm and can be used by Warrior. It requires being at least level 50 to be equipped. It will be used for the further steps of the zodiac weapon saga.
Bravura Zenith is an item level 90 Marauder's Arm and can be used by Warrior. It requires being at least level 50 to be equipped.
Just gils and exp.
Bravura Atma Zodiac Weapon
Bravura Animus is an item level 100 Marauder's Arm and can be used by Warrior. It requires being at least level 50 to be equipped.
Bravura Novus is an item level 110 Marauder's Arm and can be used by Warrior. It requires being at least level 50 to be equipped.
The Sword and the Shield.
Base relic
Zenith relic
Atma Zodiac
Animus Zodiac
Novus Zodiac
Nexus Weapon
Zodiac Weapon
Zeta Weapon
